Tamer AppStore Apk Repository

This is a repository of apps to be used with Android Tamer.

Currently it serves 22 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://i-shivamsoni.github.io/tamer_appstore_apkBank/fdroid/repo/

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
4E E6 85 C8 35 C3 09 92 74 DA 32 B6 0A 5A 65 96 02 37 5B F7 EC 0B A3 92 84 22 75 7D 46 D7 93 C0
